title: Berwick-upon-Tweed
summary: Berwick-upon-Tweed (/ˌbɛrɪk-/ (listen)), sometimes known as Berwick-on-Tweed or simply Berwick, is a town and civil parish in Northumberland, England. Located 2+1⁄2 miles (4 kilometres) south of the Anglo-Scottish border, it is the northernmost town in England.[lower-alpha 1][1] The 2011 United Kingdom census recorded Berwick's population as 12,043.[2]
